content.title: UNICEF USA BrandVoice: To Build A Better Future, Yemen's Children Must Be Educated - Forbes
content.desc: For over 70 years, UNICEF has been putting children first, working to protect their rights and provide the assistance and services they need to survive and thrive all over the world. Almost four years of fighting have taken a devastating toll on the people of Yemen, and children have suffered most of all. “Nearly 1.5 million children have been displaced, many of them living a life that is a mere shadow of what childhood should be,” says UNICEF Regional Director for Middle East and North Africa Geert Cappelaere. [id=0] Cappelaere recently visited Yemen to see how UNICEF and partners are hel...
